name: The Battle for Mata-Nui
summary: The Battle for Mata Nui is an online game based on the LEGO Bionicle franchise. It takes place during the invasion of the Bohrok swarms. The Bohrok are on a mission to completely destroy the island of Mata Nui in order to return it to how it was in the "before-time." It's up to the Toa to stop them and protect their people.
